Homes in Ukraine's city of Kharkiv avoid latest Russian air strike - mayorHomes in Ukraine's second city of Kharkiv escaped being hit by a fresh Russian missile attack on Sunday, the mayor said in a post on the Telegram messaging app. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 21:30:10 GMT XJM5XPJPA5WHYFQGCLOV6XQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/homes-ukrainian-city-kharkiv-avoid-latest- Russian-air-strike-major-2024-01-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia, Ecuador bust drug ring exporting five tons of cocaine a monthColombia and Ecuador broke up a criminal organization responsible for sending up to five tons of cocaine per month to the U.S. and Europe and captured the Colombian brothers in charge, the two countries said on Sunday. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 21:06:04 GMT 6T7DTY6TPBKTREGDERQTA2XNTE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-ecuador-bust-drug-ring-exporting- Five-tons-of-cocaine-month-2024-01-07/Luis Jaime Acosta世界美洲
EU's Michel downplays criticism of his plan to resign earlyEuropean Council President Charles Michel downplayed on Sunday criticism of his plan to resign early to run for a seat in the European Parliament, saying there was plenty of time to choose his successor and the EU had options to "avoid Viktor Orban". Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:05:41 GMT STXPMHNQFZLKFDPWZZ52T2TYPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-michel-downplays-criticism-his-plan-to-resign-early-2024-01-07/Julia Payne世界欧洲
Senior Vatican official makes case for a married priesthoodThe Roman Catholic Church should "seriously think" about allowing priests to marry, a senior Vatican official and advisor to Pope Francis said in an interview published on Sunday. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:00:20 GMT OADZ4C3U2ROUXGZ6KKWIOOS6CI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/senior-vatican-official-makes-case-married-priesthood-2024-01-07/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Israeli police kill Palestinian girl during response to ramming attackIsraeli police killed a young Palestinian girl in a car at a West Bank crossing when they opened fire on another car suspected of a ramming attack, Israeli emergency services said. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 17:20:40 GMT AMCB4LYWMFJQXOMBJW5BYI6D3E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-police-kill-palestinian-girl-while-responding-to-ramming-attack-emergency-2024-01-07/Reuters世界中东地区
Portugal's Socialists pledge to raise minimum wage, boost competitivenessThe new leader of Portugal's ruling Socialist Party (PS) Pedro Nuno Santos pledged on Sunday to increase the minimum wage and boost economic competitiveness through more incentives to select sectors, if he wins an election in March. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 17:15:03 GMT TW7EOD2HM5JT3JM3目标https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portugal-socialists-pledge-to-raise-minimum-wage-boost-competitiveness-2024-01-07/Sergio Goncalves世界欧洲
Mexican authorities investigate massacre after rival criminal groups clash in remote desertMexican authorities in the violence-plagued southwestern state of Guerrero said they were investigating a gruesome massacre that took place in a part of a remote desert where two rival criminal groups have been fighting for control. For Israel's hostage families, despondency sets in as world attention shiftsDevelopments like the presumed assassination of a senior Hamas leader and tussling over the future of Gaza have left families feeling increasingly overlooked. Israel taps Supreme Court ex-president Barak for ICJ panelIsrael has named its former Supreme Court president Aharon Barak as its addition to an International Court of Justice panel due this week to hear a genocide allegation filed against it, an Israeli official said on Sunday. Erdogan names ex-minister as his party's Istanbul mayor candidateTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Sunday named former environment minister Murat Kurum as the ruling AK Party's candidate in Istanbul's mayoral election in March, bidding to win back control of Turkey's largest city.
